original_text: Consider the ravens: They do not sow or reap, they have no storeroom or barn; yet God feeds them. And how much more valuable you are than birds!
korean_text: 까마귀를 생각하라 심지도 아니하고 거두지도 아니하며 골방도 없고 창고도 없으되 하나님이 기르시나니 너희는 새보다 얼마나 더 귀하냐

sentences.original_text: They do not sow or reap,
they have no storeroom or barn;
And how much more valuable you are than birds!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 새보다 얼마나 더 귀한지!
